abstract: A year after Greece received a bailout from Europe and the I.M.F., people’s anxiety has grown into deep despair.
snippet: A year after Greece received a bailout from Europe and the I.M.F., people’s anxiety has grown into deep despair.
lead_paragraph: ATHENS — His face contorted with anguish, Anargyros D. recounted how he had lost everything in the aftermath of the Greek economic collapse — the food-processing factory founded by his father 30 years ago, his house, his car, his Rolex, his pride and now, he said, his will to live.

headline.main: Money Troubles Take Personal Toll in Greece
headline.print_headline: Unrelenting Fiscal Troubles Take Personal Toll in Greece

abstract: After 25 years with her public relations firm Robinson Lerer & Montgomery, Linda G. Robinson will be a senior managing director and the global head of marketing and communications for BlackRock.
snippet: After 25 years with her public relations firm Robinson Lerer & Montgomery, Linda G. Robinson will be a senior managing director and the global head of marketing and communications for BlackRock.
lead_paragraph: After 25 years with her public relations firm, Robinson Lerer & Montgomery, Linda G. Robinson has left to join BlackRock as a senior managing director and the global head of marketing and communications.

headline.main: P.R. Guru Linda Robinson Joins BlackRock

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Susanne Craig
